privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introText: Welcome to ShareFair. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our circular economy platform.
privacy.dataContact: Contact Data: Email address, phone number.
privacy.dataLocation: Location Data: General area or neighborhood (to facilitate local sharing).
privacy.dataUsage: Usage Data: Information about how you use our marketplace and interact with other users.
privacy.useTransactions: Enable P2P sharing and renting transactions.
privacy.useTrust: Build community trust through ratings and reviews.
privacy.sharingText: We do not sell your data. Your contact information is only shared with another user once a sharing request is accepted to facilitate the exchange.
privacy.rightsText: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also object to the processing of your data at any time.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing or using ShareFair, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the platform.
terms.eligibilityText: You must be at least 18 years old to create an account and participate in peer-to-peer sharing. By using the platform, you represent that you meet this requirement.
terms.responsibilitiesAccuracy: Accuracy: You agree to provide accurate descriptions and photos of the items you list.
terms.responsibilitiesSafety: Safety: Owners are responsible for ensuring items are safe to use. Borrowers must use items according to their intended purpose.
terms.responsibilitiesConduct: Conduct: You agree to treat other community members with respect.
terms.rentalsLiability: Liability: ShareFair provides the platform to connect users but is not responsible for any damage, loss, or injury resulting from the use of items shared on the platform.
terms.rentalsTerms: Terms of Exchange: The specific terms (duration, pickup location) are agreed upon directly between the Owner and the Borrower.
terms.prohibitedText: Users may not list illegal, hazardous, or offensive items. ShareFair reserves the right to remove any listing at its sole discretion.
terms.environmentText: ShareFair uses algorithms to estimate CO2 savings. These are estimates provided for educational and community-building purposes.

review.alreadyReviewed: You have already reviewed this transaction

about.title: About Us
about.storyText: ShareFair was born from a simple observation: our homes are filled with items that we rarely use, while our neighbors might need those exact things right now. We believe that access is better than ownership.
about.missionText: To accelerate the transition to a Circular Economy by making peer-to-peer sharing the first choice for every community. We aim to reduce global waste and carbon emissions by maximizing the lifecycle of every product.
about.connectText: We provide a secure marketplace for renting and borrowing items locally.
about.trackText: Every exchange on ShareFair calculates how much CO2 was saved by not buying a new product.
about.trustText: Through our rating system and community-driven approach, we foster neighborhood connections that go beyond simple transactions.
about.whyText: For every drill shared, one less drill is manufactured, packaged, and shipped across the ocean. Together, we can build a future where we consume less and share more.

dispute.description: Disputes are reviewed by our team within 2 business days. Please provide as much detail as possible.

sustainability.title: Sustainability Report
sustainability.subtitle: Track the collective environmental impact of our sharing community.
